mapper.insert: insert into ai_admin (ai_admin_id, ai_admin_department, ai_admin_pwd, ai_admin_unit, ai_admin_name, ai_admin_limit, ai_user_type, ai_id_card) values (#{aiAdminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiAdminDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiAdminPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiAdminUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiAdminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiAdminLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aiUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ai_admin_id, ai_admin_department, ai_admin_pwd, ai_admin_unit, ai_admin_name, ai_admin_limit, ai_user_type, ai_id_card from ai_admin
